summary: A documentary on the late American entertainer Dean Reed, who became a huge star in East Germany after settling there in 1973.
cast: Dean Reed|Isabel Allende Bussi|Rodemil Arenda Flores|Manuel Berríos Saleh|Celino Bleiweiß|Renate Blume|Peter Boyles|Lana Davis|Jennifer Dorn|Nils Düwell|Susanne Kliemsch|Egon Krenz|Juan Meneses|Maria Moese|Armin Mueller-Stahl|Wiebke Reed|Günter Reisch|Will Roberts|Maren Zeidler
keywords: german democratic republic|actor|rock singer|political activist|reference to elvis presley
title: Der rote Elvis
